course_description: A comprehensive 8-week algorithm and data structures bootcamp designed to prepare you for technical interviews. We'll cover essential patterns, problem-solving techniques, and build strong coding fundamentals through hands-on practice.

unit_1.title: Arrays & Hash Tables Fundamentals
unit_1.description: Master the basics of arrays and hash tables - the foundation of most coding problems

unit_2.title: Advanced Array Techniques
unit_2.description: Dive deeper into array manipulation and optimization strategies

unit_3.title: Mathematical Problem Solving
unit_3.description: Learn to approach mathematical and logical challenges systematically

unit_4.title: String Processing & Patterns
unit_4.description: Advanced string manipulation techniques and pattern recognition

unit_5.title: Review & Practice Week 1
unit_5.description: Consolidate your learning with mixed practice problems

unit_6.title: Advanced Data Structures
unit_6.description: Coming soon - Trees, Graphs, and Advanced Structures

unit_7.title: Dynamic Programming Basics
unit_7.description: Coming soon - Introduction to DP patterns

unit_8.title: Final Project & Interview Prep
unit_8.description: Capstone challenges and mock interview practice
